member.name: M:YoutubeExplode.YoutubeClient.GetVideoInfoAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get full information about a video by its ID
member.param: When set to true, videos with encrypted signatures will be automatically deciphered. This requires one extra GET request and some computational time. If set to false, the will need to be deciphered manually using method. Non-deciphered objects are still fully usable, but it will not be possible to access its by URL

When set to true, it will also attempt to get file sizes of all obtained streams. This requires one extra HEAD request per stream. If set to false, you can use to get file size of individual streams. This parameter requires to be set.
member.returns: object with the information on the given video
